english.segment2: - Sometimes it feels like im watching from the outside Sometimes it feels like im breathing but am I alive I will keep searching for answers that aren't here to find
english.segment4: - All i know is I'm not home yet this is not where I belong take this world and give me Jesus this is not where I belong
english.segment6: - So when the walls come falling down on me and when im lost in the current of a raging sea i have this blessed assurance holding me.
english.segment8: - All i know is I'm not home yet this is not where I belong take this world and give me Jesus this is not where I belong
english.segment10: - When the earth shakes i wanna be found in you when the lights fade i wanna be found in you
english.segment12: - All i know is I'm not home yet this is not where I belong take this world and give me Jesus this is not where I belong x2
